item.title: How to open/view/share embedded documents in Microsoft Word for Mac (2011/2016)
item.description: You would be surprised to know that Microsoft doesn’t support a viable option to view embedded documents. Embedded PDF’s are the worst, even the .

item.title: mclock - Additional clock application for mac menu bar
item.description: Update (2016-01-20):Â The app is now available on Mac App store. Additional menu clock for your Mac. A minimalist clock to display time of different timezone of your choice.
